lessons.title: Short story: Lost Puppy
lessons.content: Sam found a lost puppy. He gave the puppy water and a cozy blanket. Sam found the puppy's owner and the puppy was happy.

lessons.title: Simple comprehension
lessons.content: Lucy read a book about space. She learned about planets and stars.

lessons.title: Story: The Picnic
lessons.content: Emma and her friends went on a picnic. They ate sandwiches and played games. It was a fun day!

quiz.question: What did they eat at the picnic?

lessons.title: Reading practice
lessons.content: Read the story and answer the questions.

quiz.question: What is the main idea of the story?

lessons.title: Story: The Lost Cat
lessons.content: Tommy lost his cat. He looked everywhere. Finally, he found her under the bed.

quiz.question: Where did Tommy find his cat?
